title: Error Purchasing RP (Riot Points)
body: I just purchased some RP to buy some of the discounted skins from the "Your Shop". However, after I confirmed the purchase through PayPal, I got an error on the League Client (An Unexpected Error had Occurred) and the RP was not delivered to my account. I am now missing the amount paid in my bank account and I have checked PayPal logs to confirm that the amount paid was sent to Riot Games. I would like some assistance ASAP to get this sorted. Happy to provide any information needed to get things sorted.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support and they'll be able to get it all sorted :)

For efficiency's sake, I would recommend attaching your paypal receipt to the ticket.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
